summary: demelza poldark is now the proud mother to the show’s latest addition . within ten minutes of tomorrow night’s episode, fans will see aidan turner’s dashing ross poldark gaze lovingly at his new baby daughter . it is reminiscent of the show’s previous pregnancy that saw elizabeth, another contender for ross’s affection, go to full term in the gap between two episodes .
